publications.title: Shape‑Morphing Hulls for Reconfigurable Vessels
publications.abstract: We demonstrate a shape‑morphing hull concept enabling on‑demand hydrodynamics tuning for aquatic vehicles. The approach leverages compliant shells and controllable actuation to achieve efficiency gains across operating regimes.

publications.title: Transforming static trusses into functional reconfigurable systems using quadrilateral linkage principles
publications.abstract: We present a method inspired by flat‑foldable quadrilateral linkages to convert static trusses into compactly stowable and rapidly deployable systems, with system‑level reconfigurability and high load capacity.

publications.title: Rapidly deployable bridge systems with linkage‑based nodes
publications.abstract: A deployable bridge prototype using bar‑linked nodes to enable compact stowage and quick field deployment without heavy equipment.
